The following code chunk shows how to plot the distribution of ranking profiles.

```{r}
library(combinat)
library(rankingQ)

tab <- lapply(permn(seq(3)), paste0, collapse = "") |>
  sample(30, replace = TRUE) |>
  unlist() |>
  table() |>
  table_to_tibble()
plot_dist_ranking(tab, ylim = 0.5)
```
